has research problem.from sentence: Exploiting Coarse - to - Fine Task Transfer for Aspect - level Sentiment Classification

Aspect - level sentiment classification ( ASC ) aims at identifying sentiment polarities towards aspects in a sentence , where the aspect can behave as a general Aspect Category ( AC ) or a specific Aspect Term ( AT ) .

To model aspect - oriented sentiment analysis , equipping Recurrent Neural Networks ( RNNs ) with the attention Copyright c 2019 , Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence ( www.aaai.org ) .
